content: about fluffy waves socks fluffy waves socks were inspired by the calming rhythm of the sea the endless rise and fall of waves soft foam dancing on the shore and the light breeze that makes you want to wrap yourself in cozy knits i wanted to capture that gentle motion in a pair of socks that feel just as comforting as a walk along the seaside these socks are knit toe-up with a diamond heel for a comfortable and well-fitting shape around the cuff delicate fluffy ruffles are worked in lace weight mohair adding playful character and a soft airy finish the body of the sock has no strict charted motif it s more like a blank canvas where the gentle fabric structure leaves room for your own imagination more experienced knitters can experiment with color lace or cables to create a pair that is as unique as the waves themselves the pattern comes in three sizes s m l and is designed for fingering weight yarn for the main sock plus a touch of lace weight mohair for the ruffles gauge is 32 sts × 44 row = 10 cm 4 in stockinette yarn and needle choice is up to you just make sure to achieve gauge sample was knit on 2 25 mm needles fluffy waves socks are my very first published design released on my birthday making them extra special
